text: Sigrid Koetse (6 September 1935 â€“ 9 February 2025) was a Dutch stage actress from 1957 to 2009. She was known for playing for years at Nederlandse Comedie, Toneelgroep Theater and Toneelgroep Amsterdam. She received the Koetse de Theo d'Or in 1988 and became knight in the Order of Orange Nassau in 1996. Next of being a stage actress she was also a film and television actress. She played among others in De Fabriek, De Appelgaard, and had a guest role in Goede tijden, slechte tijden. Koetse died at the Rosa Spier Huis in Laren on 9 February 2025, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Dutch movie actors Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from Haarlem Category:Place of death missing
title: Sigrid Koetse
